title: Rani Jhumka: Ruby Radiance with Polki Diamond Accents
features: Classic teardrop Rani Jhumka design. The centerpiece is a vibrant Burmese Ruby, elegantly cabochon cut into a pear shape. A halo of dazzling Polki diamonds delicately frames the ruby, enhancing its natural brilliance. The upper portion features a stylized floral design using Polki diamonds, adding a touch of traditional charm. Finished with a rich Hyderabadi polish for a timeless appeal.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Ideal for festivals like Sankranthi or Diwali. Can also be worn to elevate a contemporary ensemble for a sophisticated evening look. Suits Seemantham or Half-Saree function.
description: Exudes timeless elegance with its classic Rani Jhumka design. The rare Burmese Ruby is known for its exceptional color and quality. The Polki diamonds are expertly set to maximize their natural sparkle. A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. This piece is an heirloom quality investment, designed to be cherished for generations.
